attributes.action: Ignore all petitions that directly call for hurting people, or increasing their suffering – at least for d 1st 4 years, until we see how this works.
attributes.additional_details: I think it’s sensible – at least for d 1st 4 years or so, until we see how this thing works – to avoid having any petition that directly calls for hurting people, or that clearly increases their suffering, or introduces new punitive measures.
